page.title: 17EVENTS IN LAUGHARNE
page.content: Annual social events start with WI party, popular with all ages. A pantomime by Laugharne Players packs the hall too. Charitable fund-raising events include many bazaars, two Welsh Folk Dances, sponsored run, a fete, dances, sports, bingo, professional wrestling, Community Hymn-Singing. The Laugharne Civic Trust Society held an Exhibition for Environment Week of paintings of Laugharne. The Laugharne Corporation's election night, 'Big Court", is celebrated by carrying the Portreeve around the Town Hall, attended by many. Portreeve's Sunday in October and the Remembrance Sunday service are both processioned in cere- monial robes and well attended. At Christmas carol singing and dinner for OAPs. Wind and 8.6 tide caused flooding Easter Sunday 1985.
